entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
